trans-unit.source: Represents named images, which are stored in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection"></xref>.

The NamedImage class represents an image that has a unique name, and is useful when an image is dynamically created using a particular drawing routine, and then specified as the image for one of the image properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage.Name%2A> property determines the unique name of a NamedImage object.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage.Image%2A> property determines its associated image, which can be any object derived from the .NET Framework <xref:System.Drawing.Image> class.

When one of the image properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control is set by specifying a `string` value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Images%2A> collection property is first checked to determine whether an image with the specified name exists.
If a matching NamedImage object is found, this image is used.
If a matching NamedImage object is not located, the `string` value is treated as a URL, image resource name, or an image path.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"></xref> class with the specified name of the named image and its associated image.
The name of the named image.
Use this name when setting a named image to one of the image properties.
The associated image of the named image.
Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets or sets the image of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"></xref> object.
The Image property determines which image is stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> object.
Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> objects for dynamically created images, which can then be assigned to a chart image property.
The image component of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"></xref> object.
This can be any object derived from the .NET Framework <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> class, for example, a <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the unique name of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"></xref> object.
The property identifies a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> object that is stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection>.
This name must be unique, or an exception will be thrown when the object is added to the collection.
Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> objects for dynamically created images, which can then be assigned to a chart image property.
This Name property value is used when you set a chart image property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> object.

When one of the image properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control is set by specifying a `string` value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Images%2A> collection property—of type<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection>—is first checked to determine whether an image with the specified name exists.
If a matching <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> object is found, this image is used.
If a matching <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> object is not located, the `string` value is treated as a URL, an image resource name, or an image path.

A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the unique name of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"></xref> object stored in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection"></xref>.
